Equation
Z = cSqrSF(Z1) + C;
X = addDF(addDF(sqrDF(X1), -sqrDF(Y1)), A); Y = addDF(multDF(vec2(2.0, 0.0), multDF(X1, Y1)), B);
Z = cPow4(Z, P1) + C;
Z = cSqrSF(Z) + P1;
X = addDF(addDF(sqrDF(X1), -sqrDF(Y1)), vec2(P1.x, 0.0)); Y = addDF(multDF(vec2(2.0, 0.0), multDF(X1, Y1)), vec2(P1.y, 0.0));
Z = cMultSF(C, cMultSF(alpha, cPow3(Z, gamma.x)) + cMultSF(beta, cPow3(Z, -gamma.y)));
Z = sine(cDivSF(cPow3(Z1, P1.x), C));
Z = sine(cDivSF(cSqrSF(Z1) + P1, C));
Z = sine(cDivSF(cSqrSF(Z1), C) + P1);
Z = cPow4(Z1, -Z1) + P1;
Z = Z - cDivSF(cSqrSF(cSqrSF(Z)) - vec2(1.0, 0.0), 4.0*cMultSF(Z, cSqrSF(Z)));
Z = cDivSF(cMultSF(P1, Z) + P2, cMultSF(P3, Z) + P4);
modZ = modSF(Z); if (modZ > R)
modZ = modDF(X, Y); if (modZ.x > R || isinf(X.x*X.x) || isinf(Y.x*Y.x) || isinf(X.x*X.x + Y.x*Y.x))
eps = modSF(Z - Z1); if (eps < 1e-9)
eps = modSqrDF(addDF(X, -X1), addDF(Y, -Y1)).x; if (eps < 1e-9)
Z = vec2(x0, y0);
Z = C;
X = A; Y = B;
float j = float(n)/float(maxIter); colorParams.z = j;
vec2 a = vec2(0.0);
a = 2.0*cMultSF(a, Z1); a.x += 1.0;
vec2 a = vec2(0.0); vec2 Z, Z1;
float minModZ = R; int m = 0;
colorParams.z = float(m)/float(maxIter);
